original_text:
The blessings of your father
    are mighty beyond the blessings of my parents,
    up to the bounties of the everlasting hills.
May they be on the head of Joseph,
    and on the brow of him who was set apart from his brothers.
korean_text: 네 아버지의 축복이 내 선조의 축복보다 나아서 영원한 산이 한 없음 같이 이 축복이 요셉의 머리로 돌아오며 그 형제 중 뛰어난 자의 정수리로 돌아오리로다

sentences.original_text: are mighty beyond the blessings of my parents
up to the bounties of the everlasting hills
May they be on the head of Joseph
and on the brow of him
who was set apart from his brothers
